description.value:
Prerequisite: Assassin

Benefit: After a short or an extended rest, pick a weapon you're carrying. The next attack made with that weapon before your next short or extended rest deals 1d8 extra poison damage on a hit. On a miss, the extra damage is lost. The damage increases to 2d8 at 11th level and 3d8 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 27.
